insomnia.name: oa2-mate
insomnia.description: Always ready with the latest oAuth 2 token as template variable. Have a stress-free coding/testing!

scripts.publish: node npm/generate-package.js && copyfiles -u 2 ./npm/content/* ./dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 ./src/* ./dist/ && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-dry: node npm/generate-package.js && copyfiles -u 2 ./npm/content/* ./dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 ./src/* ./dist/ && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run
